Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Broccoli \Broc"co*li\, n. [It. broccoli, pl. of broccolo sprout, cabbage sprout, dim. of brocco splinter. See {Broach}, n.] (Bot.) A plant of the Cabbage species ({Brassica oleracea}) of many varieties, resembling the cauliflower. The ``curd,'' or flowering head, is the part used for food. [1913 Webster]
broccoli n 1: plant with dense clusters of tight green flower buds [syn: {Brassica oleracea italica}] 2: branched green undeveloped flower heads
